ability.Titan Gaze: The power of Rock-type moves is increased by 50% in the next turn when the user is hit by a Special move.

Cyclone Smash.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Titanic Roar.effect: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.

Crafted Strike.effect: Increases the user's Defense by 1 stage if it hits.

Mighty Stomp.effect: Has a 10% chance to flinch the target.
